categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vang was a male Miraluka Sith who served as a commander of the reconstituted Sith Empire's forces during the Korriban Incursion, when the Galactic Republic invaded the planet Korriban in 3637 BBY. during the Galactic War. Wielding a violet lightsaber and wearing a fanged mask, Vang was one four commanders who led Imperial forces in the Valley of the Dark Lords, but was slain by Republic forces in their advance to the Sith Academy.

Commander Vang appears as one of the four Imperial commanders that must be killed in the Republic version of the Tactical Flashpoint "Assault on Tython," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.7: Invasion. For Imperial players, Vang is replaced by Commander Ceryss, and the two share many of their game mechanics.
